name: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire?
name_original: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire?
description: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire? is a video game parody of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?. It was created by Hypnotix, and released in 2000 by Simon & Schuster Interactive for Windows 95, Windows 98, and Sega Dreamcast.
